# Model Setup

Let i = Observation, j = patient, k = tissue(normal/tumor).

$$y_{i,j,k} = \alpha_{j,k} + \epsilon^y_i,\epsilon^y_i \sim N(0,\sigma^2_y)$$

$$\alpha_{j,k} = \beta_j + \epsilon^\alpha_k,\epsilon^\alpha_k \sim N(0,\sigma^2_\alpha)$$

$$\beta_j = \gamma + \epsilon^\beta_j, \epsilon^\beta_j \sim N(0,\sigma^2_\beta)$$
